title: Rivalry Week With Playoff Implications | The Ringer NFL Show
description:
To lead off the show, we talk about Tom Coughlin’s recent firing from the Jaguars front office, and the pointlessness of Pro Bowl selections (0:40). Then, a Take Shop about players publicly voting for the Pro Bowl and prohibiting the franchise tag for players over 30 years old (12:45) before we get to the three biggest games of the week, headlined by Packers vs. Vikings (25:30). Finally, resident Philadelphian Chris Ryan joins the show to review the disappointing Eagles season and talk Carson Wentz (47:40).
Host: Kevin Clark
Guests: Rodger Sherman, Danny Kelly, and Chris Ryan

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
